attributes.action: A petition for people who regret their vote to Leave the EU.
attributes.background: A large number of people voted to leave the EU without being aware of the actual facts.  This petition is for people who feel that the campaign was won on lies. MP’s should be able to vote to stay in the EU without the accusation of going against democracy.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753

If you would like Parliament to decide on the UK's membership of the EU:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
